R

rating - Variable in class moblima.model.Review
Rating of the review
read(String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read the contents of the given file.
readBookingHistory(String, String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Booking history data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new Booking instances Store the booking instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Customer model to instantiate booking List Email is necessary to know which booking history belongs to which customer
readCinema(String, String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Cinema data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new Cinema instances Store the Cinema instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Cineplex model to instantiate cinema List Cineplex ID is necessary to know which Cinema belongs to which cineplex
readCineplex(String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read cineplex data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new cineplex instances Store the cineplex instances into an arrayList to be passed to the MainModel to instantiate Cineplex List
readCustomer(String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Customer data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new Customer instances Store the Customer instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Main model to instantiate customer List
readHoliday(String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Holiday data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new Holiday instances Store the Holiday instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Main model to instantiate holiday List
readMovies(String, String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Movies data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new Movie instances Store the Movie instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Cineplex model to instantiate movie List Cineplex id is necessary to know which movie belongs to which cineplex
readReview(String, String, String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Review data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new review instances Store the review instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Movie model to instantiate review List Cineplex ID and MovieID are necessary to know which review belongs to which movie from which cineplex
readShowtime(String, String, String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Showtime data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new showtime instances Store the showtime instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Movie model to instantiate showtime List Cineplex ID and MovieID are necessary to know which showtime belongs to which movie from which cineplex
readStaff(String, String) - Static method in class moblima.controller.DBController
Read Staff data from txt file and use the data accordingly to create new Staff instances Store the Staff instances into an arrayList to be passed to the Cineplex model to instantiate staff List Cineplex ID is necessary to know which Staff belongs to which cineplex
removeAllSpace(String) - Method in class moblima.view.EnterParticulars
Remove all spaces in a string text
removeSeatSelected() - Static method in class moblima.controller.BookingController
Remove a seat from seat selected array
removeShowtime() - Method in class moblima.view.AddShowtime
Removes the selected showtime.
Review - Class in moblima.model
Represents a review for a particular movie belonging to a particular cineplex.
